items.sentence: Tom looked out the window, but he didn\'t see Mary.
Tom looked so funny that I couldn\'t help laughing.
Who\'s to say it\'s not what\'s supposed to happen?
I was the one who convinced Tom to stop doing that.
I was wondering if you were going to show up today.
I watched a movie in French with English subtitles.
I went to the same school that Tom is going to now.
What\'s important isn\'t the goal, but the journey.
Tom painted the fence with the help of his friends.
Tom pushed the door open and stepped into the room.
